Ui:
---------------------------------------------ICON TEMPLATE---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if MPowa_ConfigFrame:IsVisible() then this:StartMoving() end
if MPowa_ConfigFrame:IsVisible() then this:StopMovingOrSizing() local index = GetCurrentResolution() local res = ({GetScreenResolutions()})[index] for xc,yc in string.gfind(res, "(%d+)x(%d+)") do local a,b,c,x,y = this:GetPoint(0) local scale = (0.7-this:GetScale())*(0.925-(0.64-UIParent:GetEffectiveScale())) x = ceil(x-(xc/((UIParent:GetEffectiveScale()-scale)*2))) y = ceil(y+(yc/((UIParent:GetEffectiveScale()-scale)*2))) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosX:SetMinMaxValues(MPOWA:GetMinValues(x),MPOWA:GetMaxValues(x)) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosX:SetValue(x) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosXText:SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX.." "..x) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosXLow:SetText(MPOWA:GetMinValues(x)) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosXHigh:SetText(MPOWA:GetMaxValues(x))
MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosY:SetMinMaxValues(MPOWA:GetMinValues(y),MPOWA:GetMaxValues(y)) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosY:SetValue(y) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosYText:SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_POSY.." "..y) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosYLow:SetText(MPOWA:GetMinValues(y)) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosYHigh:SetText(MPOWA:GetMaxValues(y)) end end
---------------------------------------------TEMPLATES AND GENERAL---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
this:SetOwner(WorldFrame, "ANCHOR_NONE")
MPOWA:SelectAura(this)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_CLOSE, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:Hide()
if (this.aide) then GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1) end
GameTooltip:Hide()
MPOWA:Ternary_OnClick(this, this.var)
MPOWA_PROFILE_SELECTED = this.line for i=1,7 do getglobal("MPowa_ProfileFrame_ScrollFrame_Button"..i.."_BG"):SetAlpha(1) end getglobal(this:GetName().."_BG"):SetAlpha(0.5)
MPOWA:SelectIcon(this)
---------------------------------------------MINIMAP BUTTON---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------MAINFRAME---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
this:StartMoving()
this:StopMovingOrSizing()
MPowa_MainFrame_HEAD:SetText("Modified Power Auras - Build: "..MPOWA.Build) MPowa_MainFrame_Pages:SetText("1/10")
MPowa_MainFrame:Hide() for i=1, MPOWA.NumBuffs do getglobal("TextureFrame"..i):EnableMouse(0) end PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
MPOWA:AddAura()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_ADD)
MPOWA:Edit()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_EDIT)
MPOWA:Remove()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_REMOVE)
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_PROFILE)
if MPowa_ProfileFrame:IsVisible() then MPowa_ProfileFrame:Hide() else MPowa_ProfileFrame:Show() end
MPOWA:TestAll()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_TESTALL)
MPOWA:Test()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_TEST)
MPOWA:Pager(false)
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(">")
MPOWA:Pager(true)
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText("<")
---------------------------------------------CONFIGURATION FRAME---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
getglobal(this:GetName().."_HEAD"):SetText(MPOWA_CONFIGFRAME_NAME)
if IsShiftKeyDown() and IsAltKeyDown() then MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosX:SetValueStep(0.1) elseif IsShiftKeyDown() then MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_Opacity:SetValueStep(0.01) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosX:SetValueStep(1) end
MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_Opacity:SetValueStep(0.1) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_Slider_PosX:SetValueStep(5)
MPowa_ConfigFrame:Hide() for i=1, MPOWA.NumBuffs do getglobal("TextureFrame"..i):EnableMouse(0) end PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
if MPowa_IconFrame:IsVisible() then MPowa_IconFrame:Hide() else if not MPowa_IconFrame_ButtonContainer_Button0 then MPOWA:FillButtonContainer("warrior") end MPowa_IconFrame:Show() end
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg").r = 1.0 getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg").g = 1.0 getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg").b = 1.0
MPOWA:OpenColorPicker("icon")
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg"):SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(MPOWA_COLORPICKER_TOOLTIP, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg"):SetVertexColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:Hide()
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(0,1.0) this:SetValue(1.0) this:SetValueStep(0.1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("0") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("1.0")
if MPOWA.loaded then MPOWA:SliderChange("alpha", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY) end
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(-1800,1800) this:SetValue(0) this:SetValueStep(5) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(-1800) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(1800)
if MPOWA.loaded and MPowa_ConfigFrame:IsVisible() then MPOWA:SliderChange("x", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX)
local min, max = this:GetMinMaxValues() local value = this:GetValue() if value == min and SLIDER_POSX_MIN then if value ~= -1800 then this:SetMinMaxValues(min-50,max-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max-50) SLIDER_POSX_MIN = false end elseif value == max then if value ~= 1800 and SLIDER_POSX_MAX then this:SetMinMaxValues(min+50,max+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max+50) SLIDER_POSX_MAX = false end end if value == (max - 25) then SLIDER_POSX_MAX = true elseif value == (min + 25) then SLIDER_POSX_MIN = true end end
SLIDER_POSX_MIN = true SLIDER_POSX_MAX = true
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_POSY_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(-1800,1800) this:SetValue(0) this:SetValueStep(5) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_POSY) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("-1800") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("1800")
if MPOWA.loaded and MPowa_ConfigFrame:IsVisible() then MPOWA:SliderChange("y", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_POSY)
local min, max = this:GetMinMaxValues() local value = this:GetValue() if value == min and SLIDER_POSY_MIN then if value ~= -1800 then this:SetMinMaxValues(min-50,max-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max-50) SLIDER_POSY_MIN = false end elseif value == max then if value ~= 1800 and SLIDER_POSY_MAX then this:SetMinMaxValues(min+50,max+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max+50) SLIDER_POSY_MAX = false end end if value == (max - 25) then SLIDER_POSY_MAX = true elseif value == (min + 25) then SLIDER_POSY_MIN = true end end
SLIDER_POSY_MIN = true SLIDER_POSY_MAX = true
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_SIZE_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(0.1,5.0) this:SetValue(1.0) this:SetValueStep(0.1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_SIZE) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("0.1") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("5.0")
if MPOWA.loaded then MPOWA:SliderChange("size", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_SIZE) end
this:SetMaxLetters(200) this.aide = MPOWA_EDITBOX_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_EDITBOX_NAME)
this:ClearFocus()
this:ClearFocus()
MPOWA:Editbox_Name(this)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()

this:ClearFocus()
this:ClearFocus()
MPOWA:Editbox_SecondSpecifier(this)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()

this:ClearFocus()

MPOWA:Editbox_CPStacks(this)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()

GameTooltip:Hide()

this:ClearFocus()
this:ClearFocus()
MPOWA:Editbox_Player(this)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()

this:ClearFocus()
this:ClearFocus()
MPOWA:Editbox_Duration(this)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(this.aide, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:Hide()

GameTooltip:Hide()
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_SHOWCOOLDOWN_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_SHOWCOOLDOWN)
if not MPOWA_SAVE[MPOWA.CurEdit]["cooldown"] then MPOWA.NeedUpdate[MPOWA.CurEdit] = true else if not MPOWA_SAVE[MPOWA.CurEdit]["inverse"] then MPOWA.NeedUpdate[MPOWA.CurEdit] = false end MPOWA.active[MPOWA.CurEdit] = false MPOWA.frames[MPOWA.CurEdit][1]:Hide() end MPOWA:Checkbutton("cooldown")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ENEMYTARGET_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ENEMYTARGET)
MPOWA:Checkbutton("enemytarget") if MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Checkbutton_EnemyTarget:GetChecked() or MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Checkbutton_FriendlyTarget:GetChecked() then MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_DebuffDuration:Show() MPOWA_SAVE[MPOWA.CurEdit]["unit"] = "target" else MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_DebuffDuration:Hide() end
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_FRIENDLYTARGET_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_FRIENDLYTARGET)
MPOWA:Checkbutton("friendlytarget") if MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Checkbutton_EnemyTarget:GetChecked() or MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Checkbutton_FriendlyTarget:GetChecked() then MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_DebuffDuration:Show() MPOWA_SAVE[MPOWA.CurEdit]["unit"] = "target" else MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_DebuffDuration:Hide() end
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_RAIDMEMBER_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_RAIDMEMBER)
MPOWA:Checkbutton("raidgroupmember") if MPOWA_SAVE[MPOWA.CurEdit]["raidgroupmember"] then MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_Player:Show() else MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_Player:Hide() end
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_SECS_LEFT_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_SECS_LEFT)
MPOWA:Checkbutton("secsleft") if MPOWA_SAVE[MPOWA.CurEdit]["secsleft"] then MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_SECLEFT:Show() else MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_SECLEFT:Hide() end
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_HIDE_STACKS_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_HIDE_STACKS)
MPOWA:Checkbutton("hidestacks")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_DEBUFF_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_DEBUFF)
MPOWA:Checkbutton("isdebuff") if MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Checkbutton_EnemyTarget:GetChecked() or MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Checkbutton_FriendlyTarget:GetChecked() then MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_DebuffDuration:Show() else MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_DebuffDuration:Hide() end
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_SHOWIFNOTACTIVE_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_SHOWIFNOTACTIVE)
if not MPOWA_SAVE[MPOWA.CurEdit]["inverse"] then MPOWA.NeedUpdate[MPOWA.CurEdit] = true else if not MPOWA_SAVE[MPOWA.CurEdit]["cooldown"] then MPOWA.NeedUpdate[MPOWA.CurEdit] = false end MPOWA.active[MPOWA.CurEdit] = false MPOWA.frames[MPOWA.CurEdit][1]:Hide() end MPOWA:Checkbutton("inverse")
this.var = "alive" this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ALIVE_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ALIVE)
this.var = "mounted" this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_MOUNTED_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_MOUNTED)
this.var = "incombat" this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INCOMBAT_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INCOMBAT)
this.var = "inparty" this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INPARTY_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INPARTY)
this.var = "inraid" this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INRAID_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_INRAID)
this.var = "inbattleground" this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ISBATTLEGROUND_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ISBATTLEGROUND)
this.var = "inraidinstance" this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ININSTANCE_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ININSTANCE)
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_USE_DESCRIPTION_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_USE_DESCRIPTION)
MPOWA:Checkbutton("secondspecifier") if MPOWA_SAVE[MPOWA.CurEdit]["secondspecifier"] then MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox:SetWidth(135) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox:ClearAllPoints() MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox:SetPoint("TOP", MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2, "TOP", -67.5, -20) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_SecondSpecifier:Show() else MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox:SetWidth(270) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox:ClearAllPoints() MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox:SetPoint("TOP", MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2, "TOP", 0, -20) MPowa_ConfigFrame_Container_1_2_Editbox_SecondSpecifier:Hide() end
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(0,1.0) this:SetValue(1.0) this:SetValueStep(0.1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("0") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("1.0")
if MPOWA.loaded then MPOWA:SliderChange("fontalpha", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_OPACITY) end
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(-600,600) this:SetValue(0) this:SetValueStep(5) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(-600) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(600)
if MPOWA.loaded and MPowa_ConfigFrame:IsVisible() then MPOWA:SliderChange("fontoffsetx", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_POSX)
local min, max = this:GetMinMaxValues() local value = this:GetValue() if value == min and SLIDER_OFFSETX_MIN then if value ~= -600 then this:SetMinMaxValues(min-50,max-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max-50) SLIDER_OFFSETX_MIN = false end elseif value == max then if value ~= 600 and SLIDER_OFFSETX_MAX then this:SetMinMaxValues(min+50,max+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max+50) SLIDER_OFFSETX_MAX = false end end if value == (max - 25) then SLIDER_OFFSETX_MAX = true elseif value == (min + 25) then SLIDER_OFFSETX_MIN = true end end
SLIDER_OFFSETX_MIN = true SLIDER_OFFSETX_MAX = true
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_POSY_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(-600,600) this:SetValue(0) this:SetValueStep(5) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_POSY) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("-600") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("600")

local min, max = this:GetMinMaxValues() local value = this:GetValue() if value == min and SLIDER_OFFSETY_MIN then if value ~= -600 then this:SetMinMaxValues(min-50,max-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min-50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max-50) SLIDER_OFFSETY_MIN = false end elseif value == max then if value ~= 600 and SLIDER_OFFSETY_MAX then this:SetMinMaxValues(min+50,max+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText(min+50) getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText(max+50) SLIDER_OFFSETY_MAX = false end end if value == (max - 25) then SLIDER_OFFSETY_MAX = true elseif value == (min + 25) then SLIDER_OFFSETY_MIN = true end end
SLIDER_OFFSETY_MIN = true SLIDER_OFFSETY_MAX = true

if MPOWA.loaded then MPOWA:SliderChange("fontsize", this, MPOWA_SLIDER_SIZE) end

MPOWA:Checkbutton("hundredth")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_TIMER_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_TIMER)
MPOWA:Checkbutton("timer")
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_FLASHANIM_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_FLASHANIM)
MPOWA:Checkbutton_FlashAnim()
this:SetMaxLetters(200) this.aide = MPOWA_EDITBOX_FLASHANIM_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_EDITBOX_FLASHANIM)
this:ClearFocus()
this:ClearFocus()
MPOWA:Editbox_FlashAnimStart(this)

GameTooltip:Hide()

MPOWA:Checkbutton_USEFONTCOLOR()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg").r = 1.0 getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg").g = 1.0 getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg").b = 1.0
MPOWA:OpenColorPicker("fontcolor")
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg"):SetVertexColor(NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.r, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.g, NORMAL_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(MPOWA_COLORPICKER_TOOLTIP, nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
getglobal(this:GetName().."_SwatchBg"):SetVertexColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) GameTooltip:Hide()
this.valuetext = {"Default", "ARIALN", "MORPHEUS", "Visitor2", "Accidental Presidency", "Enigma2", "VeraSe", "AlteHaas", "CaviarDreams", "ExpressWay", "ExpressWayBold", "Roboto", "The Bad Times", "Vegur"} this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_FONT_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(1,14) this:SetValue(1) this:SetValueStep(1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_FONT) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("1") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("14")
if MPOWA.loaded and this:GetValue() then local value = tonumber(this:GetValue()) if value > 0 then getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_FONT..this.valuetext[value]) MPOWA_SAVE[MPOWA.CurEdit]["timerfont"] = value MPOWA:ApplyConfig(MPOWA.CurEdit) end end
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_BEGINSOUND_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_BEGINSOUND)
MPOWA:Checkbutton("usebeginsound")
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_BEGINSOUND_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(1,64) this:SetValue(1) this:SetValueStep(1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_BEGINSOUND) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("1") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("64")
if MPOWA.loaded then MPOWA:SoundSliderChange(this, "beginsound") end
this.tooltipText = MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ENDSOUND_TOOLTIP getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_CHECKBUTTON_ENDSOUND)
MPOWA:Checkbutton("useendsound")
this.aide = MPOWA_SLIDER_ENDSOUND_TOOLTIP this:SetMinMaxValues(1,56) this:SetValue(1) this:SetValueStep(1) getglobal(this:GetName().."Text"):SetText(MPOWA_SLIDER_ENDSOUND) getglobal(this:GetName().."Low"):SetText("1") getglobal(this:GetName().."High"):SetText("56")
if MPOWA.loaded then MPOWA:SoundSliderChange(this, "endsound") end
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_TEXT_ABOUT_MPOWA)

---------------------------------------------PROFILE FRAME---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
getglobal(this:GetName().."_HEAD"):SetText(MPOWA_PROFILEFRAME_NAME)
MPOWA:ScrollFrame_Update()
MPowa_ProfileFrame:Hide() PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff")
MPOWA:Import()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_IMPORT)
MPOWA:ProfileSave()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_SAVE)
MPOWA:ProfileRemove()
getglobal(this:GetName().."_Text"):SetText(MPOWA_BUTTON_REMOVE)
FauxScrollFrame_OnVerticalScroll(40, MPOWA.ScrollFrame_Update)
MPOWA_PROFILE_SELECTED = 1 getglobal(this:GetName().."_Button1_BG"):SetAlpha(0.5) MPOWA:ScrollFrame_Update()
